short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool updating selected text with a defined prompt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to manual copy-pasting and let PromptPolish streamline your writing process. This Chrome extension allows you to refine your text with ease. Simply select the text you want to enhance, add a custom prompt, and let PromptPolish connect with services like OpenAI to transform your content for better quality and clarity.

With a focus on privacy, your credentials, inputs, and prompts are securely managed and shared only with the services you define. Experience a seamless user interface designed to save time and boost productivity while keeping your data safe.

Take your writing to the next level with PromptPolishâ€”effortless, efficient, and secure.


If you see the warning "This extension is not trusted by Enhanced Safe Browsing," please rest assured this is because this is a new extension. Google requires new extensions to establish a track record of compliance and trust over time. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out at any time!
